trans-unit.source: Represents an expression that applies a delegate or lambda expression to a list of argument expressions.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个将委托或 lambda 表达式应用到一个自变量表达式列表的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Invoke%2A> factory methods to create an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.Invoke%2A>工厂方法，用于创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> of an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Invoke>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A>的<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>是<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Invoke>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression> that represents invoking a lambda expression with specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建<xref:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression>，它表示调用指定的自变量的 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the arguments that the delegate or lambda expression is applied to.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用委托或 lambda 表达式的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> objects which represent the arguments that the delegate is applied to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" />，表示应用委托的参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the delegate or lambda expression to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取要应用的委托或 lambda 表达式。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> that represents the delegate to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 表示要应用的委托的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the node type of this expression.
trans-unit.target: 返回此表达式的节点类型。

trans-unit.source: Extension nodes should return <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension" /> when overriding this method.
trans-unit.target: 扩展节点应在重写此方法时返回 <see cref="F:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" /> of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 该表达式的 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the number of arguments to the expression tree node.
trans-unit.target: 返回表达式树节点的参数数目。

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 由于程序集重构，只能为公共的；并且在内部用于性能优化。

trans-unit.source: The number of arguments to the expression tree node as <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 作为 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的表达式树节点的参数数目。

trans-unit.source: The index of the argument.
trans-unit.target: 自变量的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns the argument at index, throwing if index is out of bounds.
trans-unit.target: 索引时返回自变量，当索引超出界限时引发。

trans-unit.source: You should not use this member.
trans-unit.target: 不应使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: It is only public due to assembly refactoring, and it is used internally for performance optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 由于程序集重构，只能为公共的；并且在内部用于性能优化。

trans-unit.source: The argument at index, throwing if index is out of bounds, as <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" />.
trans-unit.target: 索引处作为 <see cref="T:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression" /> 的自变量，索引超出界限时引发。

trans-unit.source: Gets the static type of the expression that this <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Expression" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Expression" /> 表示的表达式的静态类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Type" /> that represents the static type of the expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示表达式的静态类型的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Expression" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 结果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Expression" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments" /> property of the result.
trans-unit.target: 结果的 <see cref="P:System.Linq.Expressions.InvocationExpression.Arguments" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的表达式，它类似于此表达式，但使用所提供的子级。

trans-unit.source: If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有子级均相同，它将返回此表达式。

trans-unit.source: This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
trans-unit.target: 如果子级未更改，则为此表达式；否则为具有已更新子级的表达式。
